FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Queva

accountCreation.question: How can I create an account?
accountCreation.answer: You can create your account by clicking on the "Create your account" link in the main section or by visiting the registration page. The process is simple and fast, taking only a few minutes to complete the registration.

freePlan.question: Is Queva free?
freePlan.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that allows you to try the basic features. You can also try Queva Premium for free for one month with no commitment. The free plan includes all essential features to get started.

pointsSystem.question: How does the points and rewards system work?
pointsSystem.answer: Your customers earn points every time they visit your establishment and scan their personal QR code. You can define the rewards they can redeem once they reach certain points. The system is fully customizable and allows you to create tailored loyalty programs.

mobileMenu.question: Can I manage the digital menu from my phone?
mobileMenu.answer: Absolutely yes! Your digital menu is fully customizable and can be managed comfortably from your phone or tablet, updating in real-time for your customers. You can modify prices, add new dishes, and manage availability from anywhere.

profileSupport.question: Do you offer support for profile creation?
profileSupport.answer: Of course! If you need help, we can create your profile, upload the menu, and set up initial promotions for you. We also offer training to ensure you are autonomous in management. Our support team is always available to help you.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Absolutely yes. We use the most advanced security technologies to protect your data and that of your customers. All information is encrypted and we strictly comply with privacy regulations, including GDPR.

customerSupport.question: How can I contact customer support?
customerSupport.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 through email, live chat, and phone. We will respond within a few hours and are always ready to help you with any questions or technical issues you may have.

integration.question: Does Queva integrate with other systems?
integration.answer: Yes, Queva integrates perfectly with major restaurant management systems, POS, and delivery platforms. We offer open APIs and native integrations to ensure a smooth transition without disrupting your workflow.

pricing.question: What are the costs of premium plans?
pricing.answer: Our premium plans start from €29/month and include advanced features such as detailed analytics, automated marketing, priority support, and advanced customizations. We also offer discounts for annual payments and custom plans for large companies.

technicalRequirements.question: What are the technical requirements?
technicalRequirements.answer: Queva works on any device with a modern web browser. No complex software installations are required. For customers, just a smartphone with a camera to scan QR codes. The system is optimized to work even with slow internet connections.
